item.title: GOG Store - Overkill search
item.description: I had 1.30 euro remaining on my GOG wallet and I had to use them before sept. 19 or I would lose them. So I started to search on the GOG Store for a game whose price would be less or equal to 1.30 euro and greater than 0€ (since I wasn’t searching a free game…) but the default filters of the website’s search engine allowed me to filter only games whose price was less than 5€.
